history.narrative: Law 6-69, the “Youth Rehabilitation Amendment Act of 1985,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-47, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 25, 1985 and July 9, 1985, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 29, 1985, it was assigned Act No. 6-72 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
